definition.de:
Ein oft nummerierter Teil einer nacheinander veröffentlichten Publikation wie einer Zeitschrift oder eines mehrbändigen Werks. Er kann eine Zeitspanne, z. B. ein Jahr, darstellen.

Siehe auch [Blogeintrag](http://blog.schema.org/2014/09/schemaorg-support-for-bibliographic_2.html).
definition.en:
A part of a successively published publication such as a periodical or multi-volume work, often numbered. It may represent a time span, such as a year.

See also [blog post](http://blog.schema.org/2014/09/schemaorg-support-for-bibliographic_2.html).
definition.fr:
A part of a successively published publication such as a periodical or multi-volume work, often numbered. It may represent a time span, such as a year.

See also [blog post](http://blog.schema.org/2014/09/schemaorg-support-for-bibliographic_2.html).
definition.es:
A part of a successively published publication such as a periodical or multi-volume work, often numbered. It may represent a time span, such as a year.

See also [blog post](http://blog.schema.org/2014/09/schemaorg-support-for-bibliographic_2.html).

title.de: ActivityPub und Freunde - Eine Ontolgie des Fediverse
title.en: ActivityPub and friends – An ontology of the fediverse
title.fr: ActivityPub et ses amis - Une ontologie du fediverse
title.es: ActivityPub y sus amigos - Una ontología del fediverso
